name: Corviknight
description: The Raven Pokémon. With their great intellect and flying skills, the black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Any move targeting this Pokémon directly (non-area of effect moves) reduces its PP by two when activated.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents in combat with this Pokémon cannot eat held berries.

abilities.name: Mirror Armor
abilities.description: When affected by an effect that lowers this Pokémon's attack roll, AC, movement, or ability scores, the same effect is applied to the source (if applicable).
